name: Professionally-cleaned 1BD in downtown Boston, fast wifi
description:
Gorgeous 1BD/1BA Unit in the heart of Boston - Downtown. Professionally managed and cleaned with stylish kitchen, free high-speed wifi and 24/7 support. Fully stocked with all the convenience you would expect at a hotel.

Other things to note
Modern city living at its best, located in Downtown Boston. Location is just a few blocks away from Boston Common, Park Street Church, Boston Public Garden and Tufts Medical Center. Easily accessible via MBTA's Green and Orange Lines. Amenities include a laundry room, package receiving service, heat and air conditioning, hardwood floors and an elevator for ease of access. Huge windows provide a lot of natural light and wonderful panoramic views. All units are furnished and equipped with a flat screen TV, first aid kit, free fast wifi, basic kitchenware and bathroom amenities. Our amazing customer support team are always available to help with your needs.

We offer complimentary upgrades to our regular loyal guests
